Song of Horror is a singleplayer cinematic camera adventure and survival horror game.

Headphones and a controller are recommended for a more immersive experience.

General information

GOG.com Community Discussions
GOG.com Support Page
Steam Community Discussions

Version differences[edit]

The Complete Edition includes all five episodes.

Type Notes
DLC Additional game content.
One-time game purchase The game requires an upfront purchase to access.

Essential improvements[edit]

Skip intro videos[edit]

Replace LogosInicio.mp4 with dummy mp4 file[2]
  1. Go to <path-to-game>\SongOfHorror\Content\Movies\.
  2. Delete or rename the existing file LogosInicio.mp4.
  3. Download the dummy file LogosInicio.mp4 from here.
  4. Place the downloaded file in <path-to-game>\SongOfHorror\Content\Movies\.

System Location

Frame rate is capped at 62 FPS by default. To uncap, open c:\Users\ ... \AppData\Local\SongOfHorror\Saved\Config\WindowsNoEditor\GameUserSettings.ini , then find FrameRateLimit=0.000000 and place desired value, for example FrameRateLimit=117.000000

See the engine page to force native HDR output, or the glossary page for other alternatives.
Color blind mode
See the glossary page for potential workarounds.
The game engine may allow for manual configuration of the game via its variables. See the Unreal Engine 4 page for more details.

Issues fixed[edit]

Crash on startup (AMD GPUs)[edit]

Update AMD graphics drivers[9]

Crash on startup (Intel 10th gen CPU or newer)[edit]

Apply the workaround until the issue is resolved[10]
  1. Press WinKey+R to open the Run window
  2. Type in and enter SystemPropertiesAdvanced.
  3. Click on Environment Variables.
  4. In System Variables, click on New.
  5. Enter the following:
 - Variable Name: OPENSSL_ia32cap
 - Variable Value: ~0x20000000

Selected resolution does not persist[edit]

Enable the following compatibility setting for SongOfHorror.exe:[11]
  • Disable display scaling on high DPI settings

System requirements[edit]

Windows
MinimumRecommended
Operating system (OS) 7, 810
Processor (CPU) 2.6 GHz3.0 GHz
System memory (RAM) 8 GB12 GB
Storage drive (HDD/SSD) 25 GB
Video card (GPU) Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
AMD Radeon HD 7950
DirectX 11 compatible		Nvidia GeForce GTX 980
AMD Radeon RX 580
A 64-bit operating system is required.


Notes

  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 Notes regarding Steam Play (Linux) data:
    • File/folder structure within this directory reflects the path(s) listed for Windows and/or Steam game data.
    • Games with Steam Cloud support may also store data in ~/.steam/steam/userdata/<user-id>/1096570/.
    • Use Wine's registry editor to access any Windows registry paths.
    • The app ID (1096570) may differ in some cases.
    • Treat backslashes as forward slashes.
    • See the glossary page for details on Windows data paths.
